tags: chyan stop doing this to me
summary:
*Cyrus and TJ are in PE, playing baseball*
Cyrus: I'm gay.
TJ: Oh? So you and I play for the same team, then.
Cyrus: Huh?...
body:
*Cyrus and TJ are in PE, playing baseball*

Cyrus: I’m gay.

TJ: Oh? So you and I play for the same team, then.

Cyrus: Huh?

Cyrus: What are you talking about? Mr. Bag put us on different teams.

TJ: No no, I mean we both swing the same way.

Cyrus: Uh … Is that some kind of baseball reference?? You know I know nothing about sports!

TJ: CYRUS NO I’M TRYING TO TELL YOU I’M GAY AS WELL!

Cyrus: Well duh, I knew that.

Cyrus: But what does that have to do with baseball??

Cyrus: Well duh, I knew that.

Cyrus: But what does that have to do with baseball??

Cyrus: Uh … Is that some kind of baseball reference?? You know I know nothing about sports!

TJ: CYRUS NO I’M TRYING TO TELL YOU I’M GAY AS WELL!

Cyrus: But what does that have to do with baseball??

blog.name: mackmeta
blog.title: Meta, Analysis, and Speculation
blog.description: I'm Dave (he/him). I'm a fan of Andi Mack, Riverdale, and Girl Meets World, and other shows and movies. Feel free to send me asks!

summary: Any ideas as to why Peyton, Trent and Lilan are filming currently in SLC for Andi Mack??
question: Any ideas as to why Peyton, Trent and Lilan are filming currently in SLC for Andi Mack??
answer:
Re-shoots as Trent confirmed today. Their lunch set up for today looks very similar to the set up they had when they were filming some sort of fancy dinner for either ep 14 or 16 and some vlogger revealed that a casting notice had gone out for actors with fine dining clothes. We know that Stoney was on set for filming at the dinner so I’m guessing that whatever his role was it was important to the plot and couldn’t be cut without damaging the rest of the show. Which makes sense, I did a post on how difficult it would have been to cut Ham out of 2x12 as a generic example and it would have been very difficult without re-shoots. I do applaud Disney for going this route though and ensuring that we won’t ever have to see Ham on screen again; leaving even brief clips of him in would have really tainted the final eps.

I would imagine Ham was likely meant to have some very heart warming scenes with Bowie and Bex and probably Andi scattered throughout 3c especially as he could have filled the father figure role for Bowie. I don’t think they’ll have the time or money to re-shoot all of his scenes; more likely they’re just re-shooting any vital scenes like at the dinner or the wedding or the Mack family outing in 3x20 that can’t be cut and need to be replaced by giving Ham’s lines to someone else like Celia or Bex or Bowie. 

We’re probably looking at a mix of extended scenes for other characters to pad out the running time, airing any minor non Ham scenes that likely would have been cut otherwise, re-shoots for important scenes, and cuts and edits to try and salvage what can’t be re-shot. Some eps will likely be smoother than others and some are likely to be a bit shorter than others but it will make those episodes easier to watch and will help the show’s legacy. I could see the wedding for example having some extended muffy and jandi scenes, some re-shoots so Celia takes Ham’s place in the most important moments, and awkward close ups and camera angles in other scenes.

It is interesting that they’re working on a Sunday; probably trying to get the re-shoots done as quickly as possible. It’s also interesting that they didn’t use our friends at Yun Casting for the re-shoots though that might be the attempt to keep the re-shoots as quietly as possible. In order to get their Utah tax credits production had to spend the entire budget of $19.4 million and I’d imagine there would be very little left over if anything by the end of ep 21 so these re-shoots are likely coming out of other Disney funds. These re-shoots will extend post production a bit so we may be looking at a longer hiatus between 3b and 3c then we got between 3a and 3b. It will be interesting to see how these re-shot and edited eps end up looking

summary: in the extended promo, when buffy says "unexpected twist" she's still in her carnival clothes but it's daytime, meaning it...
body:
in the extended promo, when buffy says “unexpected twist” she’s still in her carnival clothes

but it’s daytime, meaning it happens before andi shows the wish to whoever that is in andi shack with her, and before the next day since they’re all wearing different clothes

“unexpected twist” can’t be related to the wish since andi hasn’t shown anyone yet, so what is it related to?

as we all know, andi’s texts is known to foreshadow events happening in the next episode, like cyrus telling andi about his bubbe rose passing away and inviting her to the shiva

yesterday’s texts gave us this:

and we know from cast pictures that tj is in 3x12

i’m just gonna leave this here for you all to scream about

summary: Do you think tyrus will have a storyline other then in the finale when they’ll probably be like we’re dating and that’s it
question: Do you think tyrus will have a storyline other then in the finale when they’ll probably be like we’re dating and that’s it
answer:
they are going to have to have a little more quiet romantic build-up leading up to the finale. i think there’s a good chance their feelings, or at least something about their relationship, will be brought up in 319 when jandi and tyrus go to the basketball game together. i think in the finale they will confess/discuss their feelings for one another, to canon the slow burn ship. 

tj will be involved in a couple of other storylines with cyrus along the way though, that also include other characters, etc. that aren’t specifically romantic if that’s what you meant though.

summary: am tag: talking about the coming out or tj scene  me: the scene at the beginning of the episode is a MASTERPIECE. they put in so...
caption:
am tag: talking about the coming out or tj scene 

me: the scene at the beginning of the episode is a MASTERPIECE. they put in so many heartwarming details and even took the time to create a whole poster board of pictures of Bubbe Rose. i mean, the episode JUST started and I am already crying my eyes out. cyrus sitting sadly on the stairs, looking down at the guests with the beautiful soft music playing in the background? that’s powerful.

summary: Kinda bummed we're probably not gonna get a carnival parallel with TJ. I wanted Cyrus to win HIM a dinosaur even if just a...
question: Kinda bummed we're probably not gonna get a carnival parallel with TJ. I wanted Cyrus to win HIM a dinosaur even if just a platonic (albeit coded) joke
answer: I never really expected that to be a parallel that would actually happen. I liked the idea of TJ and Cyrus being at the carnival (/amusement park) together and everything being chill, unlike the Ciris/Jamber date but I never personally thought it would be as obvious as the stuffed animal thing idk.

reblog.comment: I never really expected that to be a parallel that would actually happen. I liked the idea of TJ and Cyrus being at the carnival (/amusement park) together and everything being chill, unlike the Ciris/Jamber date but I never personally thought it would be as obvious as the stuffed animal thing idk.

I liked the idea of TJ and Cyrus being at the carnival (/amusement park) together and everything being chill, unlike the Ciris/Jamber date but I never personally thought it would be as obvious as the stuffed animal thing idk.

I liked the idea of TJ and Cyrus being at the carnival (/amusement park) together and everything being chill, unlike the Ciris/Jamber date but I never personally thought it would be as obvious as the stuffed animal thing idk.

blog.name: lovinmullen
blog.title: the love story between two men
blog.description: Leo. he/him. @wanna-feel-alive <3 !!

summary:
OKAY BITCHES BUCKLE UP BECAUSE IM ABOUT TO SHOW THIS HUMAN SOME LOVE BECAUSE THEY ARE SO INCREDIBLY TALENTED !!!!
*clears...
body:
@heart-eyes-kippen

OKAY BITCHES BUCKLE UP BECAUSE IM ABOUT TO SHOW THIS HUMAN SOME LOVE BECAUSE THEY ARE SO INCREDIBLY TALENTED !!!!

*clears through*

okay so, i just finished binge reading Chalk (late to the craze i know) but holy shit i am so glad i read it !!! it was so beautifully written. i cried. i laughed. i wheezed. i was in awe. every chapter and everything written was perfect also i love, endlessly, how protective Marty was over Cyrus !!!!! like holy shit, that’s a friendship i never thought i needed but i am so glad it got introduced to me. the protection and genuine care he held for Cyrus especially after the whole TJ freak out thing, i honestly loved it so god damn much !!!!! ALSO CYRUS WAS SO SALTY AND BLUNT. I FUCKING LOVED IT !!!!! no one writes him like that (at least in the things i’ve read) and i’m so glad you did because seeing him stand up for himself and not allowing to be pushed over so quickly not only made me really happy and proud it made me glad to because it was so refreshing to see??!!! my boy deserves to know his worth.

all in all. it was art. i thoroughly enjoyed it. it was perfect. it was adorable. i??? i just love it so much okay??? thank you for writing it !!!!! UWU💝💘💞
